comments: hes a great professor, however his lectures are straight from the book and VERY boring. you get a quiz each night on the chapter and the final is on the questions from those quizzes. easy class to get an a in. but its a long semester with this class

all of the below rating is true, except he has you read the chapter and literally copies charts out of the book instead of coming up with an interesting lecture using his own "experience" in business or adding to the topic. Videos are from the 80\'s. Just read the book or take it online. MONOTONE...Bring your pillow.
